snippet: President Mohamed Morsi on Monday pardoned all those charged with or convicted of acts “in support of the revolution” since the beginning of last year’s uprising.
lead_paragraph: President Mohamed Morsi on Monday pardoned all those charged with or convicted of acts “in support of the revolution” since the beginning of last year’s uprising.

headline.main: Egypt: President Pardons Some Political Prisoners
headline.print_headline: Egypt: President Pardons Some Political Prisoners
